Text: The South American Youth Olympic Games (Spanish: "Juegos Suramericanos de la Juventud"; Portuguese: "Jogos Sul-Americanos da Juventude") is a regional multi-sport event organized by the Organización Deportiva Suramericana (ODESUR).
